title.rendered: Streamline Your Operations With Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1516221931411{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Streamline Your Operations With Marketing Automation

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1526326815519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Air Date:
Tuesday, August 29, 2017
Time:
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1507570167359{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156776″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509103177251{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”155619″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509103201759{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]You might already know how much time you can save by automating your marketing and sales efforts. But what about using marketing automation after you’ve closed a deal? Learn how one agency partner revamped a B2B client’s operations using SharpSpring.

In this webinar, Rupert Morris of Munro Agency discussed how he helped the client:

  • Use data to engage sports fans in a personalized and meaningful way.
  • Track all of your initiatives so you can measure the value of your partnerships.
  • Evaluate and improve your own approach to sports partnerships.

[/vc_column_text]

Your Hosts:

Rupert Morris

Founder, Munro Agency

Rupert is the founder of The Munro Agency and in charge of devising new and profitable marketing campaigns for clients. He is also the agency’s driving force behind making marketing automation accessible to more businesses.

Michelle Moore

Director of External Relations, SharpSpring

As SharpSpring's Spokeswoman, Michelle is responsible for building brand awareness to ensure businesses are aware of SharpSpring’s marketing automation platform and the agency-focused model. She has more than 20 years of marketing and public relations experience, including developing and implementing integrated marketing campaigns for small businesses and large corporations.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch Webinar:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy



[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row button_size=”default” button_type=”3d” button_style=”default” button_align=”center” icon_type=”” icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-adjust” icon_openiconic=”vc-oi vc-oi-dial” icon_typicons=”typcn typcn-adjust-brightness” icon_entypo=”entypo-icon entypo-icon-note” icon_linecons=”vc_li vc_li-heart” icon_align=”left” icon_align_animated=”left” animated_style=”default” fill_style=”default” button_link=”” button_text=”Watch Webinar” button_color=”green” button_fullwidth=”1″ button_bg_color=”” button_text_color=”” button_border_color=”” animation=”” animation_delay=”0″ el_class=”js-btn-scroll-to btn-scroll-to” icon_custom_icon=”” border_width=”” custom_delay=””][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
